entities.description: Ron is mentioned as speaking and having a plan to double-cross Griphook.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is mentioned as being on the watch for possible skulduggery.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as disapproving of the planned double-cross.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill's warning is mentioned as being in mind for Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and has a plan to double-cross Griphook.

relationships.description: Ron is watching Griphook, as mentioned in the text: 'With Bill’s warning in mind, Harry could not help suspecting that Griphook was on the watch for possible skulduggery.'
Harry is watching Griphook, as mentioned in the text: 'With Bill’s warning in mind, Harry could not help suspecting that Griphook was on the watch for possible skulduggery.'

Hermione is disapproving of Harry's plan to double-cross Griphook, as mentioned in the text: 'Hermione disapproved so heartily of the planned double-cross that Harry had given up attempting to pick her brains on how best to do it:'

Ron and Harry are planning to double-cross Griphook, as mentioned in the text: 'Ron, on the rare occasions that they had been able to snatch a few Griphook-free moments, had come up with nothing better than “We’ll just have to wing it, mate.”'
